articles.title: FIFA World Cup Qualifiers: Paraguay manage to keep Lionel Messi quiet in goalless draw against Argentina
articles.description: The point maintained Argentina's unbeaten run in qualifying and solidified their second place in the single qualifying table behind runaway leaders Brazil, who were playing Venezuela later.

articles.title: Soccer-Argentina draw 0-0 at Paraguay to maintain unbeaten record
articles.description: "I think we made their goalkeeper one of the game's best players." Argentina next have home games against Uruguay (Oct. 10) and Peru (Oct. 14), while Paraguay are away to Chile on Sunday and then travel to Bolivia on Thursday.
articles.content:
Argentina failed to score for the first time since June 2019 but a 0-0 draw at Paraguay on Thursday maintained their unbeaten record in South America's 2022 World Cup qualifiers.

articles.title: Paraguay Stifle Lionel Messi in Argentina World Cup Qualifier Stalemate
articles.description: Lionel Messi was kept quiet as Paraguay held Argentina to a goalless draw in their South American World Cup qualifiers.
articles.content:
Paraguay kept Lionel Messi quiet in a goalless draw against Argentina on Thursday in the South American World Cup qualifiers.
The point maintained Argentina’s unbeaten run in qualifying and solidified their second place in the single qualifying table... [2336 chars]

articles.title: Soccer-Argentina draw 0-0 at Paraguay to maintain unbeaten record
articles.description: Argentina have gone 23 games without defeat under coach Lionel Scaloni and are second in the qualifying group behind Brazil, the only other unbeaten team, who play at Venezuela later on Thursday. The top four teams qualify automatically for Qatar next year and the fifth-placed side goes into an inter-regional playoff.
articles.content: Argentina failed to score for the first time since June 2019 but a 0-0 draw at Paraguay on Thursday maintained their unbeaten record in South America's 2022 World Cup qualifiers. Argentina have gone 23 games without defeat under coach Lionel Scaloni ... [1005 chars]

articles.title: World record Qantas rescue flight departed with empty seats
articles.description: Qantas broke an aviation record when it flew stranded Australians home from Argentina - but just 107 passengers boarded a plane with a reported capacity of 236. Follow updates here.
articles.content:
51 mins ago – 1.43AM
Michael Read
It was branded the world’s longest flight, but Qantas’ record-breaking repatriation trip from Buenos Aires departed with empty seats, stranding Australians in South America who accused the flag carrier of a marketing... [898 chars]

articles.title: Fever Dream review - a beautiful and bonkers future cult classic
articles.description: Director Claudia Llosa returns to form with a woozy work about a cosy domesticity in rural Argentina shattered by uncanny intruders
articles.content: After making high-arthouse awards-magnet The Milk of Sorrow in her native Peru in 2009, director Claudia Llosa stumbled in 2014 with her first English-language feature, Aloft which, despite its title, failed to take flight. And while seven years isn’... [2306 chars]

articles.title: Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni supports biennial World Cup proposal
articles.description: FIFA is pushing a plan to stage its showcase tournament every two years instead of every four years, but the proposal has been widely criticised by football officials in both Europe and South America.
articles.content:
